subject: Football
lead_paragraph: To motivate the Giants’ defense before Sunday’s game against the Saints, the team watched film of the 49-24 thumping by New Orleans last season in which the Saints amassed 577 yards.
snippet: To motivate the Giants’ defense before Sunday’s game against the Saints, the team watched film of the 49-24 thumping by New Orleans last season in which the Saints amassed 577 yards.
